title: The anti-spam campaign
author: VD
content_html:
Ricky Vaughn is leading the campaign to get VP off Twitter’s spam list.

Please help.
1. Click this link https://support.twitter.com/forms/spam2. Click “I can’t tweet a link”
3. Submit this link: voxday(dot)blogspot(dot)com

I appreciate everyone’s efforts on my behalf.
content_text:
Ricky Vaughn is
leading the campaign
to get VP off Twitter’s spam list.
Please help.
1. Click this link
https://support.twitter.com/forms/spam

I appreciate everyone’s efforts on my behalf.
